cause.description:
just off the coast of vancouver island warm drifts from the south, cold drifts from the west, and massive bong tokes from the east have collided and started a pizza hoarding, chamber clearing menace dubbed hurricaine bryson by the residents of the small victorian basement 'middle earth'. this natural disaster has caused the ravage of candy shops and parties alike, and we would like you to maybe donate a slice or a nug or something.
1. eat
2. drink
3. bouge
cause.mission: supply victims of hurrikain bryson with funds and relief supplies.
cause.name: hurrikain bryson support fund.
